name: NSWorkspace.AuthorizationType
desc: The types of privileged file operations that can be authorized by the user.

items.name: case createSymbolicLink
items.desc: Authorization for the app to create a symbolic link.

items.name: case replaceFile
items.desc: Authorization for the app to perform an atomic file write without changing the target file's permissions.

items.name: case setAttributes
items.desc: Authorization for the app to change specific file attributes.
